title.narrative: East and Southern Africa Staple Food Markets Programme

description.narrative: This activity (East and Southern Africa Staple Food Markets Programme) is a component of Eastern and Southern Africa Staple Food Markets Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £27,567,597. This component benefits Africa, regional, and works in the following sector(s): Agricultural development, Trade facilitation. , with the following implementing partners: DAI Europe. The start date is 01-09-2011 and the end date is 28-11-2018.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
